name: part_002
file: tmp_【ラミィ生誕記念2022】今年も好き放題やります！100万円晩酌【 #やかまし100万円飲み会 ⧸ホロライブ】 [hzmimWcN34Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Song performance section featuring Hololive members covering 'The☆Peace!'.
MC section in a virtual room where the members celebrate Lamy's birthday and start a 1 million yen drinking party.

subtitles.original: …は 君にいくね
subtitles.english: ...is going to you

subtitles.original: ハハハハハ
subtitles.english: Hahahahaha

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ！ ピース！ピース！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go! Peace! Peace!

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ！ ピース！ピース！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go! Peace! Peace!

subtitles.original: 達成感遂げちゃ
subtitles.english: Once you've achieved success,

subtitles.original: 決めらんないのは
subtitles.english: what you can't decide on

subtitles.original: 恋愛のエトセトラ
subtitles.english: is the etcetera of romance

subtitles.original: いっせーの！レッツゴー！レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: One, two, go! Let's go! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 道行く人が親切だった (ピース！)
subtitles.english: The people on the street were kind (Peace!)

subtitles.original: 嬉しい出来事がありました (Yeah! ピース！)
subtitles.english: Something happy happened (Yeah! Peace!)

subtitles.original: 愛おしい人が正直でした (ピース！)
subtitles.english: My beloved person was honest (Peace!)

subtitles.original: 全てを受け止めようと感じました (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: I felt like I should accept everything (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: Wow wow wow wow Peace! Wow wow...
subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow Peace! Wow wow...

subtitles.original: 青春の1ページって 地球の歴史からするとどれくらいなんだろう？
subtitles.english: How long is one page of youth in the history of the Earth?

subtitles.original: ああ 愛おしいあの人 お昼ご飯何食べたんだろう？
subtitles.english: Ah, my beloved... I wonder what they had for lunch?

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ！ そうだ皆行こうぜ！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go! That's right, everyone let's go!

subtitles.original: さあほら歌おうぜ！ そうだ皆歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's sing! That's right, everyone let's sing!

subtitles.original: ほら誓おうぜ！ そうだ皆誓おうぜ！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's vow! That's right, everyone let's vow!

subtitles.original: さあほら愛そうぜ！ 最高級で愛そうぜ！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's love! Let's love in the highest class!

subtitles.original: Wow... (ピース！ピース！)
subtitles.english: Wow... (Peace! Peace!)

subtitles.original: 道行く人が正直だった (ピース！)
subtitles.english: The people on the street were honest (Peace!)

subtitles.original: 嬉しい出来事がありました (Yeah! ピース！)
subtitles.english: Something happy happened (Yeah! Peace!)

subtitles.original: 愛おしい人が正直でした (Yeah! ピース！)
subtitles.english: My beloved person was honest (Yeah! Peace!)

subtitles.original: 全てを受け止めようと感じました (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: I felt like I should accept everything (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: ラミィ！ お誕生日おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Lamy! Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ラミィ！ お誕生日おめでと～！！
subtitles.english: Lamy! Happy Birthday!!

subtitles.original: 何だこれ何だこれ。凄い絵面。
subtitles.english: What's this? What's this? What a sight.

subtitles.original: 飲むの？とりあえず乾杯しよう。
subtitles.english: Are we drinking? Let's have a toast for now.

subtitles.original: こちらはノエルのポーションでございやす。
subtitles.english: This here is Noel's potion.

subtitles.original: ノエポ。では皆さん一緒に飲みましょう。
subtitles.english: NoePo. Now then, let's all drink together.

subtitles.original: かんぱーい！
subtitles.english: Cheers!

subtitles.original: どうした？
subtitles.english: What's wrong?

subtitles.original: 旨！めっちゃ爽やかな味だよ。
subtitles.english: Tasty! It's such a refreshing taste.

subtitles.original: 犬には早かったか？ｗ
subtitles.english: Was it too early for a dog? lol

subtitles.original: ジンだからね。色んなボタニカルが。
subtitles.english: It's Gin, you see. Lots of botanicals.

subtitles.original: 自然なナチュラルな感じの気がしてね。
subtitles.english: It has a natural feel to it.

subtitles.original: 上にハッシュタグ的なものが。すごいじゃん。
subtitles.english: There's like a hashtag thing at the top. Amazing.

subtitles.original: 台本どんどん飛ばしてくね。
subtitles.english: You're skipping the script like crazy.

subtitles.original: 「いやぁ良いんですか？ ラミィの誕生日でゲストに呼んで頂いたんですけど、こんな寛いじゃって。」
subtitles.english: 'Well, is it okay? I was invited as a guest for Lamy's birthday, but making myself so at home.'

subtitles.original: 「良いんですよ～！」
subtitles.english: 'It's okay~!'

subtitles.original: ラミィちゃんのセリフだったこれ。
subtitles.english: That was Lamy-chan's line.

subtitles.original: グダグダや、ごめん。
subtitles.english: It's a mess, sorry.

subtitles.original: 今日はね、かねてから登録者数100万人達成したら
subtitles.english: Today, as I decided long ago, once I reach 1 million subscribers

subtitles.original: 100万円分のお酒を飲むと決めてたのにね、飲んじゃおうと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd drink 1 million yen worth of alcohol, and now I'm going to do it!

subtitles.original: ということで、本日のハッシュタグがこちら！
subtitles.english: So, here is today's hashtag!

subtitles.original: #やかまし100万円飲み会！いえーい！
subtitles.english: #Noisy1MillionYenDrinkingParty! Yay!

subtitles.original: 100万円分飲めるってことですね？
subtitles.english: So you mean we can drink 1 million yen worth?

subtitles.original: 今日はお酒が前半戦で…
subtitles.english: Today, Japanese sake is for the first half...
